data.title: Rural Municipality of Walpole #92
data.text:
Order No. 38/2024

IN ACCORDANCE with Bylaw No. 1 / 2022 of the Rural Municipality of Walpole No. 92 and with regulations prescribed by the Minister of Municipal Government:

NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that effective 7:00 a.m. Thursday, August 29, 2024 and until further notice, the following public roadways shall be CLOSED TO ALL TRAFFIC:

Twp Rd 102 for 1 mile from Range Road 1321 to Range Road 1332

( South of Section 14-10-32 w1m )

Anyone contravening this order shall be subject to a fine as per the General Penalty Bylaw No. 1/2013.

Every person who contravenes any provision of any bylaw of the municipality is guilty of an offence and liable on summary conviction:

in the case of an individual, to a fine not exceeding $10,000 and, in the case of a continuing offence, to a further fine not exceeding $2,500 for each day during which the offence continues; and

in the case of a corporation, to a fine not exceeding $25,000 and, in the case of a continuing offence, to a further fine not exceeding $2,500 for each day during which the offence continues.

DATED at Wawota, Saskatchewan this 28th day of August, 2024.4.

Reeve: Blair Wilson Road Ban Committee Member

Deputy Reeve: William Hollingshead Road Ban Committee Member

Order No. 37/2024

IN ACCORDANCE with Bylaw No. 1 / 2022 of the Rural Municipality of Walpole No. 92 and with regulations prescribed by the Minister of Municipal Government:

NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that effective Immediately. Wednesday, August 28, 2024 and until further notice, the following public roadways shall be OPEN TO ALL TRAFFIC:

Range Road 1332 from Township Road 125 to Township Road 130 – 1 Mile

( West of Section 35-12-33 w1m )

DATED at Wawota, Saskatchewan this 28th day of August, 2024.

Every person who contravenes any provision of any bylaw of the municipality is guilty of an offence and liable on summary conviction:

in the case of an individual, to a fine not exceeding $10,000 and, in the case of a continuing offence, to a further fine not exceeding $2,500 for each day during which the offence continues; and

DATED at Wawota, Saskatchewan this 28th day of August, 2024.24.

Reeve: Blair Wilson Road Ban Committee Member

Deputy Reeve: William Hollingshead Road Ban Committee Member

Order No. 35/2024

IN ACCORDANCE with Bylaw No. 1 / 2022 of the Rural Municipality of Walpole No. 92 and with regulations prescribed by the Minister of Municipal Government:

NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that effective immediately, Friday, August 9, 2024 and until further notice, the following public roadways shall be OPEN TO ALL TRAFFIC:

Range Road 1334 (Grid 601) from Township Road 120 to Township Road 122 – 2 Miles

(West of Sections 04-12-33 w1m and 09-12-33 w1m)

DATED at Wawota, Saskatchewan this 9th day of August, 2024.m)

Order No. 33/2024

IN ACCORDANCE with Bylaw No. 1 / 2022 of the Rural Municipality of Walpole No. 92 and with regulations prescribed by the Minister of Municipal Government:

NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that effective 7:00 a.m. Tuesday, August 6, 2024 and until further notice, the following public roadways shall be CLOSED TO ALL TRAFFIC:

Range Road 1334 (Grid 601) from Township Road 120 to Township Road 122 – 2 Miles

(West of Sections 04-12-33 w1m and 09-12-33 w1m)

Anyone contravening this order shall be subject to a fine as per the General Penalty Bylaw No. 1/2013.

Every person who contravenes any provision of any bylaw of the municipality is guilty of an offence and liable on summary conviction:

in the case of an individual, to a fine not exceeding $10,000 and, in the case of a continuing offence, to a further fine not exceeding $2,500 for each day during which the offence continues; and

in the case of a corporation, to a fine not exceeding $25,000 and, in the case of a continuing offence, to a further fine not exceeding $2,500 for each day during which the offence continues.

DATED at Wawota, Saskatchewan this 2nd day of August, 2024.24.

Reeve: Blair Wilson Road Ban Committee Member

Deputy Reeve: William Hollingshead Road Ban Committee Member
